title: FIDDLESTICKS DISABLE?!
body:
Hi, I am Bill Video Game.
I am very distraught to find that the only champion in League of Legends, Fiddle-Sticks, to be disabled from play due to a "Bug".
This has brought me to the edge of tears, as time and time again, Fiddelsticks has proven in being the best champion in the Champion roster pool. Seeing that he is disabled barres me from playing League of Legends in general due to him being the only champ in the game.
Fiddlesticks has changed my life through his usage of the crow and the life drain, which resonants very well with the struggles encountered in life and the horrors seen day to day by the general population.
Please Rito, have a soul
And un-disable Fiddlesticks
Sincerely,
Bill Video Sticks

EDIT : Fiddlesticks has no bugs.
EDIT 2 : Good to see I am getting overwhelming support during these trying times.
Edit 49 : I understand how severe the bug is, hence me posting this rant on the MEMES AND GAMES board.

replies.body: there was a bug... if you killed an unit with an aa and ulted afterwards immediately the ult cd was negated and you would just flash right onto them...
>Implying you could kill anything with a Fiddle auto and time it perfectly with your ult.
That feel when meme arrows don't work on boards

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JptLg9Mx,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-01-03T12:04:12.821+0000)
>
> That feel when meme arrows don't work on boards

\>implying meme arrows don't work on boards.

God Bless.

Please share your secrets

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JptLg9Mx,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-03T17:08:36.531+0000)
>
> God Bless.
> 
> Please share your secrets

\\ is the escape character. Type it, and the thing after it will be displayed as a character (I write \\ by typing two of them). So,

\\\>

becomes

\>

One step closer to becoming the ultimate meme machine

\>prepareyourselfgd.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JptLg9Mx,comment-id=0006000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-03T17:49:31.920+0000)
>
> One step closer to becoming the ultimate meme machine
> 
> \>prepareyourselfgd.jpg

xD
I completely agree. As a professional Fiddle-Sticks main, I find this horribly disturbing.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/WVFlFgLe-fiddlesticks-has-a-serious-bug-right-now

I just find it funny how long ago the bug was actually discovered (1-2 months ago?)...with a video showing exactly how to do it, before fiddle was finally disabled. (note that is not even close to the first report of it. First one was someone jumping the raptor wall and proceeding to die because it caught him off guard)

Guys, this is a serious problem.

My partner and I met through league of legends. While neither of us ever truly mastered Fiddlesticks, we've both played him on free weeks, and we've dreamt of truly carrying with him one day. Indeed, it was even our goal for one of us to venture into the LCS as Fiddlesticks mid, to showcase what an amazing champion he actually is.

With Fiddlesticks temporarily disabled, we've found our dreams in shambles. We have nothing to talk about anymore, nothing to bond over. Our relationship is in serious distress. We don't even sleep in the same bed anymore.

Please return Fiddlesticks to the game for the sake of our relationship.

Thank you,
jpersinne

It is good to see that the disabling of Fiddlesticks is not only affecting me on a deeper level.
I hope Rito has the heart and soul to bring back our beloved Fiddlesticks for both of our mention problems.
I once saw faker play Middlesticks in the LC$, and I followed in his footsteps to become a true LCS Middlesticks main.
Just an FYI, and not to be rude, but I just want to point out that Faker is is LCK
I AM LITERALLY HAVE A MENTAL BREAKDOWN!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
{{champion:121}} Ate him.
{{champion:9}} WHY U LEAVE ME{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
i am thinking that IF THEY DISABLE FIDDLES FOR A MONTH I WILL SKEWER SOMETHING ON A RUSTY FORK

Bill are you drunk who the heck plays fiddle ._.

joke~~~

I dont like how OP'd his life-drain is already as it stands...and now his ult insta-pop's?
Fiddlesticks = Big Troll right now...explains why a lot of peope we're banning him outta draft and poro matches lately.

The Insta-pop is the bug, but Fiddlesticks's main weakness is any form of CC/Stun. For example - If Fiddle is charging his ult and gets stunned by who ever, Ult goes back on its cool down and can't be casted again. This is also true for his Drain effect.

Then...lemme ask you...
Have you been stacked on cho' gath T6 Ult, lvl 18, and Fed to the Tooth?
We're talking Hp/def+m..def and a smidge of AP?
Pretty sad that a lvl 18 cho can get 4-shot by a lvl 14 fiddle with roughly 300-400 AP...and lacking a few Key Items that would increase the potency of his Life Drain, even while "terrorized".

tbh, tl;dr
Fiddle hurts, and fail noobs abuse this.

I was playing Fiddlesticks and I was ganking bot lane with my ult from the river bush. For some reason the ult cancelled itself and I just flashed into the middle of the lane and kept autoing the enemy ADC. It was a good gank, I'm pretty sure both teams saw the whole thing and just laughed in all chat.

Guys, don' t worry. It' s just for the new year eve event where he dies in the lore, but probably he will be back again

In the meantime #RIPFiddlesticks2016
Well I mean there is a bug.

* 1. me too! I wanto Fiddle My Sticks
{{champion:9}}
Fabulous.

Personally, I don't like Fiddlesticks
